thread.title: Poor customer service
thread.title_full: Poor customer service - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dmhrolltide
title: Poor customer service
text: I am not sure if it is customary to not have room service at a hotel of this caliber but this one does not. I went to the bar after being told this to order a to go order, but was told by the pretentious bar tender they don't do to go orders. I told him I was a guest and he said they still do not make orders to go. I was told I could make my own to go order but that was it. Very poor service and just an air cockiness and looking down on us. Won't be staying at this hotel and don't have a real desire to visit NY again.
